content: 5 Top Tools for Government Tech [INFOGRAPHIC] Zach Taiji April 16, 2014 April 16, 2014 1266 Views Share on Facebook Tweet on Twitter + Over the past few years, cloud computing has become an increasingly popular technology for businesses around the world because of its ease of access from remote locations – removing the need for locally installed software. Cloud computing and SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) tools can be great solutions for local and state-level governments with limited resources, since most solutions are affordable, scale to specific needs and allow employees to access secure data from anywhere. As governments get larger in size (federal), there are even custom-built and propietary solutions. 5 Top Tools for Government Tech [INFOGRAPHIC]

Zach Taiji April 16, 2014 April 16, 2014
1266 Views
  • Share on Facebook
  • Tweet on Twitter
  • +

Over the past few years, cloud computing has become an increasingly popular technology for businesses around the world because of its ease of access from remote locations – removing the need for locally installed software.

Cloud computing and SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) tools can be great solutions for local and state-level governments with limited resources, since most solutions are affordable, scale to specific needs and allow employees to access secure data from anywhere. As governments get larger in size (federal), there are even custom-built and propietary solutions.

Over the past few years, cloud computing has become an increasingly popular technology for businesses around the world because of its ease of access from remote locations – removing the need for locally installed software.

Cloud computing and SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) tools can be great solutions for local and state-level governments with limited resources, since most solutions are affordable, scale to specific needs and allow employees to access secure data from anywhere. As governments get larger in size (federal), there are even custom-built and propietary solutions.

Big Data Has Transformed The Web Hosting Market On Both Ends

Below are 5 SaaS tools for local and state governments that cover everything from managing citizen relationships to tracking government funds and finances.
